## Subscriber.handleChange() method

Called when a source this instance has subscribed to changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleChange(source: any, args: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | <code>any</code> | The source of the change. |
|  args | <code>any</code> | The event args detailing the change that occurred. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
